title: So Why Nerf Ghost But Not Flash?

replies.body: At this point flash is a game mechanic, not a summoner spell.

This is honestly the answer.

Flash was so powerful for so long, that the entire game and champion pool is basically built around it. It can't be changed at this point.

Whereas Ghost is taken on a small subset on champions, and therefore when they deem it is overwhelming it is easier for them to tweak it.

i still feel like flash needs to be given as a weaker version of its current self on an unused key to every champ while removing it from the summoners spell because 9/10 people in every game i see have flash and that just limits your options if you actually want to do good you need to have flash
